content: उन्नयन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} With the eyes raised upwards; <ls>R. 4. 3.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Raising, elevating, lifting up. {@--2@} Drawing up water. {@--3@} The vessel out of which a fluid is taken. {@--4@} Leading away, extracting. {@--5@} Making straight, smoothing; सीमंत°. {@--6@} Deliberation, discussion. {@--7@} Inference; श्रवणादनु पश्चादीक्षा अन्वीक्षा उन्नयनं.
